channel.title: Counter Strike: Source - Sound on a server
channel.description:
Ok, so I was wondering if it is possible to add sounds to your LAN server, aka the one you play with your friends on a lan or bots.
By sounds I mean the classic: "Headshot", "Dominating" etc.
And if it works on lan server, how do I do it?
Do I need mani admin plugin, or doesn't it work on lan servers at all? :confused:
